name: DataTypes
title: Google
Cloud
Speech
V1
DataTypes
description:
Google::Protobuf

Class Description
Google::Protobuf::Any +Any+ contains an arbitrary serialized protocol buffer message along with a URL that describes the type of the serialized message.
Google::Protobuf::Duration A Duration represents a signed, fixed-length span of time represented as a count of seconds and fractions of seconds at nanosecond resolution.

Google::Rpc

Class Description
Google::Rpc::Status The +Status+ type defines a logical error model that is suitable for different programming environments, including REST APIs and RPC APIs.

Google::Cloud::Speech::V1

Class Description
Google::Cloud::Speech::V1

Google Cloud Speech API Contents

Class Description
SpeechClient Google Cloud Speech API.
Google::Cloud::Speech::V1::LongRunningRecognizeMetadata Describes the progress of a long-running +LongRunningRecognize+ call.
Google::Cloud::Speech::V1::LongRunningRecognizeResponse The only message returned to the client by the +LongRunningRecognize+ method.
Google::Cloud::Speech::V1::RecognitionAudio Contains audio data in the encoding specified in the +RecognitionConfig+.
Google::Cloud::Speech::V1::RecognitionConfig::AudioEncoding Audio encoding of the data sent in the audio message.
Google::Cloud::Speech::V1::RecognizeResponse The only message returned to the client by the +Recognize+ method.
Google::Cloud::Speech::V1::Speech::Service Service that implements Google Cloud Speech API.
Google::Cloud::Speech::V1::SpeechContext Provides “hints” to the speech recognizer to favor specific words and phrases in the results.
Google::Cloud::Speech::V1::SpeechRecognitionAlternative Alternative hypotheses (a.k.a.
Google::Cloud::Speech::V1::SpeechRecognitionResult A speech recognition result corresponding to a portion of the audio.
Google::Cloud::Speech::V1::StreamingRecognitionResult A streaming speech recognition result corresponding to a portion of the audio that is currently being processed.
Google::Cloud::Speech::V1::StreamingRecognizeResponse +StreamingRecognizeResponse+ is the only message returned to the client by +StreamingRecognize+.
Google::Cloud::Speech::V1::WordInfo Word-specific information for recognized words.
